meanings.sent1: Suburbanization has led to more people living outside the city.
meanings.sent2: My family moved to the suburbs during the suburbanization of our town.
meanings.sent3: The suburbanization of the neighborhood made finding a parking spot a lot easier.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening sparked a suburbanization of her backyard.
meanings.sent5: The suburbanization of the area brought new schools and parks for families to enjoy.

meanings.sent1: We witnessed the suburbanization of the countryside as more houses were built.
meanings.sent2: Suburbanization often results in increased traffic on the highways.
meanings.sent3: The suburbanization of the town made it feel more like a small city.
meanings.sent4: The rapid suburbanization of the region surprised many long-time residents.
meanings.sent5: Suburbanization can bring both benefits and challenges to a community.
